title: Ordering at a Cafe
description: Practice ordering your favorite drink at a coffee shop

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Hi! Welcome to Coffee House. What can I get for you today?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Hi, I'd like a medium latte, please.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Sure! Would you like that hot or iced?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Any milk preference? We have oat, almond, or regular.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Perfect! That'll be $5.50. Will that be all?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Great! Your order will be ready in just a moment.
